LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_AssignMechOverlay: show assigned overlay for mechanoid spots
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_AssignMechOverlay: shows the name of the assigned mech on their mech spots.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_UnassignMechOverlay: show unassigned overlay for mechanoid spots
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_UnassignMechOverlay: shows the unassigned label on unassigned mech spots.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_ColorAssignMechOverl: allow colored assignment labels for dead mechs
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_ColorAssignMechOverla: yellow = mech is dead\nred = mech is destroyed and will disassign from the spot after loading
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_ColorFromFramework: use color overlay in mechanitor color
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_ColorFromFramework: colored mechlink range needs to be activated in [AV] Core Framework settings
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_PsychicDisturber: framework setting: Use psychic disturber placeworker for sockets and bandnodes
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_PsychicDisturber: might look weird when unchecked and connected with normal power conduits. As a framework setting this might effect other [AV] mods.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_CenteredSpots: center spots on the tiles (requires a restart)
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_CenteredSpots: check this if you don't like the offset of the spots towards the bottom
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_SolarFlare: allow usage of spots when unpowered
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_SolarFlare: unchecked: \nMechs will stop their task when the spot is unpowered
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_DefaultDormantRechar: default spot setting: Allow mechs to dormant recharge on spots
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_DefaultDormantRecharg: newly build spots will use this as default. Does not change already build spots.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxDesc_ChargingSocketProduce: check to force charging sockets to produce the same amount of toxic waste as biotechs recharger. Toxic waste gets dropped directly on the floor when the internal storage is full. Uncheck for no waste production.
LanguageData.AV_SettingsBoxLabel_Mechspots_DevLogging: devmode: Show devtools and debug logging
LanguageData.AV_SliderDesc_ChargingSocketSpace: production of waste needs to be turned on, otherwise this setting does nothing.
LanguageData.AV_InfoString_limitedpower: are powered by limited power cells
LanguageData.AV_InfoString_limitedpower_neverwork: (mechs with limited power cells will never work)
